summary: The Consensual Donation and Research Integrity Act of 2025 amends the Public Health Service Act to regulate the donation and transfer of human bodies and body parts for education, research, and mortuary science, excluding transplantation. It mandates registration for entities that sell human bodies/parts for profit, outlines record-keeping, labeling, and packaging standards, and sets limitations on information usage and disclosure. The bill also addresses disposition of remains and establishes penalties for violations.
